mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_id, category_id, board_type, board_title, board_content, board_secret, user_id, user_name) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{categoryId}, #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardSecret}, #{userId}, #{userName})
mapper.select:
SELECT
,c.category_name FROM board b JOIN category c ON c.category_id = b.category_id
ORDER BY
CONCAT('b.', #{orderCondition}, ' ', #{order})
b.create_date DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
